text: {{Infobox writer | name = Gamal el-Ghitani | image = Gamal Ghitany.jpg | alt = | caption = 2014 | birth_date = | birth_place = Gihena, Egypt | death_date = | death_place = Cairo, Egypt | nationality = Egypt | occupation = Journalist , Author , Novelist. | notableworks = }} Gamal el-Ghitani, (9 May 1945 - 18 October 2015) was an Egyptian author of historical and political novels and cultural and political commentaries. He was the editor-in-chief of the literary periodical Akhbar Al-Adab ("Cultural News") from 2011 until his death in 2015. He died on 18 October 2015 at the El Galaa Hospital For Armed Forces Officers Families in Cairo from a heart attack, aged 70. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Egypt Category:Egyptian writers Category:Egyptian journalists
title: Gamal El-Ghitani
